### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE blockchain_consensus_history (
  consensus_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  consensus_algorithm VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  previous_algorithm VARCHAR(50),
  next_algorithm VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  change_timestamp TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW()
)

### STATEMENT

TRUNCATE TABLE blockchain_consensus_history;
